dialogue.text: Whats up my coporeal friend! I am whisper, At your service!
I am a Yo-kai! That thing you humans call a ghost, spirit, or a extraterrestrial being!
Yo-kai? that sounds like some edgy rock band
Yeah yeah whatever, So you are probably wondering why I was in the spooky capsule machine?
About 190 years ago some self righteous monster declared me! a menous to society and locked me in the machine!
hold on how old are you
Nevermind all that. What is important is that you have managed to...
SET ME FRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
uhhhh
And now you and I have entered a sacred bond! More then a friendship, more than a marriage, I AM FOREVER IN DEBT TO YOU!
(bf has walked away)
WWHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA\nAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA\nAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
yeah uh i dont care\ni just wanna eat lunch\nthats the entire reason im here
You do not know what you are passing up here!
i can rap\ni have a good career\ni think im good enough
bf lets go this is stupid
Rrr.. Listen just hear me out.
(bf walks away further)
WWAAAAAAAAAAIIIIIIT A MINUTTTTEEEEE
YOU KIDS TODAY HAVE NO RESPECT
alright alright\n ill cut you a deal
if you can beat me in a song i will listen, if i beat you you have to buy me subway
Nice, but additionally. You have to wear this watch!
yeye whatever
huh
lets go you spoon full of fluff!
